methodPatterns.documentation:
## Summary

Unity calls Awake when an enabled script instance is being loaded.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/MonoBehaviour.Awake.html)

## Summary

Start is called on the frame when a script is enabled just before any of the Update methods are called the first time.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/MonoBehaviour.Start.html)

## Summary

Update is called every frame, if the MonoBehaviour is enabled.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/MonoBehaviour.Update.html)

## Summary

Frame-rate independent MonoBehaviour.FixedUpdate message for  physics calculations.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/MonoBehaviour.FixedUpdate.html)

## Summary

LateUpdate is called every frame, if the Behaviour is enabled.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/MonoBehaviour.LateUpdate.html)

## Summary

OnGUI is called for rendering and handling GUI events.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/MonoBehaviour.OnGUI.html)

## Summary

This function is called when the object becomes enabled and active.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/MonoBehaviour.OnEnable.html)

## Summary

This function is called when the behaviour becomes disabled.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/MonoBehaviour.OnDisable.html)

## Summary

Destroying the attached Behaviour will result in the game or Scene receiving OnDestroy.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/MonoBehaviour.OnEnable.html)

## Summary

Called when a Collider with the Collider.isTrigger property overlaps another Collider.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/Collider.OnTriggerEnter.html)

## Summary

OnTriggerExit is called when the Collider other has stopped touching the trigger.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/Collider.OnTriggerExit.html)

## Summary

OnTriggerStay is called almost all the frames for every Collider other that is touching the trigger.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/Collider.OnTriggerStay.html)

## Summary

OnCollisionEnter is called when this collider/rigidbody has begun touching another rigidbody/collider.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/Collider.OnCollisionEnter.html)

## Summary

OnCollisionExit is called when this collider/rigidbody has stopped touching another rigidbody/collider.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/Collider.OnCollisionExit.html)

## Summary

OnCollisionStay is called once per frame for every Collider or Rigidbody that touches another Collider or Rigidbody.

[Learn More](https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.0/Documentation/ScriptReference/Collider.OnCollisionStay.html)
